title: Truffle5: issue with truffle-hdwallet-provider
body:
Hi

I'm using Truffle 5 beta 2 and the Truffle HDWallet Provider. 
For an unknown reason, I'm not able anymore to deploy my contract to Ropsten.

I have the following error:
```
$ truffle migrate --compile-all --reset --network ropsten
Error: Cannot find module 'any-promise'
    at Function.Module._resolveFilename (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:581:15)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:507:25)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:637:17)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:22:18)
    at /Users/eloudsa/ChainSkills/projects/chainlist-truffle5/node_modules/truffle-hdwallet-provider/dist/webpack:/truffle-hdwallet-provider/webpack/universalModuleDefinition:3:1
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/eloudsa/ChainSkills/projects/chainlist-truffle5/node_modules/truffle-hdwallet-provider/dist/webpack:/truffle-hdwallet-provider/webpack/universalModuleDefinition:1:1)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:689:30)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:700:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:599:32)
    at tryModuleLoad (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:538:12)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:530:3)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:637:17)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:22:18)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/eloudsa/ChainSkills/projects/chainlist-truffle5/truffle-config.js:1:26)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:689:30)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:700:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:599:32)
    at tryModuleLoad (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:538:12)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:530:3)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:637:17)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:22:18)
    at Function.Config.load (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-config/index.js:387:1)
    at Function.Config.detect (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-config/index.js:376:1)
    at Object.run (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/commands/migrate.js:165:1)
    at Command.run (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/command.js:113:1)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/cli.js:47:1)
    at __webpack_require__ (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/webpack/bootstrap 1b5412eb3ddc7c8d5561:19:1)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/webpack/bootstrap 1b5412eb3ddc7c8d5561:65:1
    at Object.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/cli.bundled.js:71:10)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:689:30)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:700:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:599:32)
    at tryModuleLoad (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:538:12)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:530:3)
    at Function.Module.runMain (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:742:12)
    at startup (internal/bootstrap/node.js:282:19)
    at bootstrapNodeJSCore (internal/bootstrap/node.js:743:3)
Truffle v5.0.0-beta.2 (core: 5.0.0-beta.2)
Solidity v0.5.0 (solc-js)
Node v10.14.2
```
I use the following dependencies:
````
"dependencies": {
    "dotenv": "^6.2.0",
    "truffle-hdwallet-provider": "^1.0.0-web3one.4"
  }
````

I have the same problem with `Truffle v5.0.0-next.24`.

Any idea how to fix this issue?

Thanks

Btw, I fixed the issue by installing "any promise", so I'm not stuck.
Do you plan to include this package in a next version or will we have to install it ourselves in our projects?

**UPDATE**:
On another Mac, I also had to install "binding" to skip the following error:
```
Error: Cannot find module 'bindings'
```

Thanks for raising this @eloudsa !

#1548 should resolve this.

Just had the same issue with **truffle v5.0.0**

```
$ npm install any-promise
npm WARN kauri-protocol-contracts@1.0.0 No description

+ any-promise@1.3.0
added 1 package from 1 contributor and audited 164 packages in 3.047s

--------------------------------
$ truffle migrate --reset
⚠️  Important ⚠️
If you're using an HDWalletProvider, it must be Web3 1.0 enabled or your migration will hang.
Try: npm install --save truffle-hdwallet-provider@web3-one


Starting migrations...
```

Thanks for reporting @gjeanmart! Looking into it.

I have just installed the final version of Truffle 5.

I have uninstalled and installed truffle-hdwallet-wrapper (version 1.0).

When I try to migrate on Ropsten , I have another error:
```
$ truffle migrate --reset --compile-all --network ropsten
Error: Cannot find module 'websocket'
    at Function.Module._resolveFilename (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:581:15)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:507:25)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:637:17)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:22:18)
    at require (/Users/eloudsa/ChainSkills/ChainList/chainlist-truffle5/node_modules/truffle-hdwallet-provider/dist/webpack:/truffle-hdwallet-provider/webpack/universalModuleDefinition:3:1)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/eloudsa/ChainSkills/ChainList/chainlist-truffle5/node_modules/truffle-hdwallet-provider/dist/webpack:/truffle-hdwallet-provider/webpack/universalModuleDefinition:1:1)
```

```
"dependencies": {

```

@gjeanmart @eloudsa truffle-hdwallet-provider 1.0.1 just got published.

`npm i truffle-hdwallet-provider` should default to it. Hopefully got this squared away. I tested manually 🤞

My problem has been solved thanks to the version 1.0.1.
Thanks @CruzMolina !!!
If issues from @gjeanmart is also solved, we can close this issue.
@gjeanmart will happily re-open if there's still an issue.
Sure thanks for your reactivity. Will try that later today!
Hey @kyriediculous , hopefully you were able to resolve this, but since truffle v5 you can simply do `npm i truffle-hdwallet-provider`. Latest should contain the missing dep!

I got the same issue.
